attributes.action: confer on all ex-armed forces personnel the post-nominal letters "Vt" (Veteran)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The role of our armed forces veterans in our society is receiving increased recognition, with the introduction of the Veterans' badge and the Armed Forces Day. As a further mark of respect it is proposed that former servicemen and women are allowed to use the post-nominal letters "Vt" (as in John Smith Vt) to indicate their status.
